content: **knitted knee-length skirt in drops brushed alpaca silk and drops alpaca the piece is worked top down in stocking stitch sizes xs - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see everfern sweater pattern here 1 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #everfernskirt drops design pattern as-204 yarn group c + a or d ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** xs - s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **yarn** drops brushed alpaca silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 100-100-100-125-125-150-150 g colour 32 moss green and use drops alpaca from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 150-150-200-200-200-250-250 g colour 7895 dark forest **accessories** trouser-elastic approx 70 to 130 cm **needles for sizes xs - s - m** drops circular needle size 4 5 mm length 60 cm and 80 cm drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 60 cm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need 80 cm circular needle in each size **needles for sizes l - xl - xxl - xxxl** drops circular needle size 4 5 mm length 80 cm drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 80 cm **knitting gauge** 17 stitches in width and 22 row in height with stocking stitch and 1 strand of each quality on needle size 4 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm 19 stitches in width and 25 row in height with stocking stitch and 1 strand of each quality on needle size 3 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/263-39-everfern-sweater
